embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

replies.body:
Hey navarreg,

This is intended behavior. Shadowfire Kindred isn't available for purchase, but since Kindred is coming out this patch, the content is already loaded into the client. :]

May I ask if you can tell me when Kindred is coming out? Is it next week, or in a couple of days?
P.S. I'm very, very excited to get Kindred.

Nice! Can't wait for Kindred, give my thanks to Riot for making such a cool champ. Do you know the day that Kindred will be released next week or is that yet to be confirmed? Sorry for all the questions but I really would like to know, got my rp ready and waiting.
We haven't announced an exact day just yet. Keep an eye out. :3
Ok, thank you sooooo much for answering my questions, that has put my mind at ease knowing that Kindred is coming soon. As always, keep up the good work, loving it so far!

> [{quoted}](name=Tartoken,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ePtB4Vsa,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-10-02T17:24:49.692+0000)
>
> May I ask if you can tell me when Kindred is coming out? Is it next week, or in a couple of days?
> P.S. I'm very, very excited to get Kindred.

As a programmer, my guess is they have some bugs (like Kindred looking like Amumu) that need to be fixed. The programmers don't know exactly how much work that will be, but are expecting to be done next week. When they think they've worked out all the bugs, he will be released. Riot doesn't know exactly when that is.

This is all speculation, though; I could be totally wrong.
Ah ok, I have seen Kindred's profile on the champion page and it keeps changing from amumu to ahri to annie, it's very weird.
Gotcha. It seemed weird to me since this screen isn't accessible through the store, but is through the champion mastery page on my profile, where Kindred's picture is currently {{champion:32}}.
Yup, that's normal. :] There are some issues with Kindred's icons, and we're working to get 'em fixed before we launch Kindred!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ePtB4Vsa,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-02T17:14:01.072+0000)
>
> Yup, that's normal. :] There are some issues with Kindred's icons, and we're working to get 'em fixed before we launch Kindred!

Makes sense. Good luck to the programmers! They have a busy weekend.
